_module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" global_colors_info="{}" sticky_enabled="0"]<script>document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    // Mappa degli slug delle categorie con i loro selettori di menu<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    // Italiano<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    const categoryMapIT = {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        'news_eventi': 'a[href*="category/news_eventi"]',<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        'news_fiere': 'a[href*="category/news_fiere"]', <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        'news_formazione': 'a[href*="category/news_formazione"]',<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        'news_prodotti': 'a[href*="category/news_prodotti"]',<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        'news_promozione': 'a[href*="category/news_promozione"]',<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        'news_social': 'a[href*="category/news_social"]'<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    };<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    // Inglese<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    const categoryMapEN = {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        'news-events-en': 'a[href*="category/news-events-en"]',<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        'news-trade-shows-en': 'a[href*="category/news-trade-shows-en"]',<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        'news-training-en': 'a[href*="category/news-training-en"]',<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        'news-products-en': 'a[href*="category/news-products-en"]',<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        'news-promotion-en': 'a[href*="category/news-promotion-en"]',<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        'news-social-en': 'a[href*="category/news-social-en"]'<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    };<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    // Rileva la lingua dall'URL<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    const isEnglish = currentUrl.includes('/en/');<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    const categoryMap = isEnglish ? categoryMapEN : categoryMapIT;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    // Ottieni l'URL corrente<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    const currentUrl = window.location.href;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    // Rimuovi la classe current-menu-item da tutti i link del menu<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    const menuLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.menu a, nav a, .menu-item a');<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    menuLinks.forEach(link => {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        link.classList.remove('current-menu-item');<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        // Rimuovi anche dal parent li se presente<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        const parentLi = link.closest('li');<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        if (parentLi) {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            parentLi.classList.remove('current-menu-item');<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    });<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    // Controlla se siamo nella pagina principale news<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    const newsPagePattern = isEnglish ? '/en/news/' : '/news/';<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    if (currentUrl.includes(newsPagePattern) && !currentUrl.includes('/category/')) {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        // Evidenzia "Tutte" / "All" - assumendo che il link sia quello verso /news/ o /en/news/<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        const tutteLink = document.querySelector(`a[href*="${newsPagePattern}"]`);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        if (tutteLink && !tutteLink.href.includes('category')) {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            tutteLink.classList.add('current-menu-item');<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            const parentLi = tutteLink.closest('li');<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            if (parentLi) parentLi.classList.add('current-menu-item');<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        return;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    // Estrai lo slug della categoria dall'URL<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    let categorySlug = null;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    // Controlla se siamo in una pagina di categoria<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    const categoryMatch = currentUrl.match(//category/([^/]+)//);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    if (categoryMatch) {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        categorySlug = categoryMatch[1];<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    } else {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        // Controlla se siamo in un singolo post con categoria nell'URL<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        if (isEnglish) {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            // Per inglese: /en/news-products-en/post-title/<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            const postMatch = currentUrl.match(/staging22.toro-ag.spaziodemo.xyz/en/([^/]+)//);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            if (postMatch && postMatch[1] !== 'news' && postMatch[1] !== 'category') {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->                categorySlug = postMatch[1];<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        } else {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            // Per italiano: /news_eventi/post-title/<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            const postMatch = currentUrl.match(/staging22.toro-ag.spaziodemo.xyz/([^/]+)//);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            if (postMatch && postMatch[1] !== 'news' && postMatch[1] !== 'category' && postMatch[1] !== 'en') {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->                categorySlug = postMatch[1];<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    // Se abbiamo trovato uno slug di categoria, evidenzia il link corrispondente<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    if (categorySlug && categoryMap[categorySlug]) {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        const targetLink = document.querySelector(categoryMap[categorySlug]);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        if (targetLink) {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            targetLink.classList.add('current-menu-item');<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            // Aggiungi la classe anche al parent li se presente<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            const parentLi = targetLink.closest('li');<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            if (parentLi) {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->                parentLi.classList.add('current-menu-item');<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->});<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --></script>[/et_pb_code][et_pb_menu menu_id="235" active_link_color="#CD2027"
